name: Morphin Corpse
description:
A Jump n' Run, but everytime you die you leave a corpse behind that can morphe into a lot of useful Things!

It may seem like a normal straight forward Platformer at first, but your way changes depending on how often you die.

You can change the object the Corpse morphes into by hitting the number keys. Every Number Key has its own Object that needs to be unlocked on your jurney!

Controls -- w,a,s,d to move -- o to jump -- p to morph your corpse -- i to use special abilities of some morph forms -- space for pause
